title: Sindicato Nacional de Trabajadores de la Industria de Alimentos
text:
The National Union of Food Industry Workers (, SINALTRAINAL) is a Colombian <a href="food%20industry">food industry</a> <a href="trade%20union">trade union</a>.
The group has repeatedly tried to form unions in Colombia for workers of <a href="Panamco">Panamco</a>, a Colombian <a href="Coca-Cola">Coca-Cola</a> bottling company, and have documentation of many members or leaders being murdered, kidnapped, and tortured by <a href="right-wing">right-wing</a> <a href="paramilitary">paramilitary</a> groups such as the <a href="Autodefensas%20Unidas%20de%20Colombia">AUC</a> in order to prevent unionisation. They are a central focus of the ongoing <a href="Coca-Cola%20boycott%20movement">Coca-Cola boycott movement</a> <a href="http%3A//killercoke.org/"></a> prevalent across college <a href="campus">campus</a>es worldwide (see <a href="criticism%20of%20Coca-Cola">criticism of Coca-Cola</a>).
